title: Virtual Theatre: Beyond the Garden of Adrian

subtitles.title: Project Description
subtitles.content: Beyond the Garden of Adrian is a virtual theatre experience created in Unity adapted from a 1 on 1 immersive theatre performance by Adrian Howells. The experiment aims to explore the potential of building intimate experience in a virtual environment, and explore how each elements in the virtual environment each uniquely contribute to the immersiona and embodiment of each audiences.

subtitles.title: My Responsibility
subtitles.content: I resiponsible for listening to the onpnions of the professionals and organize them into an actionable design and feasible development plan. I collaborated closely with the team to design and implement various interactive elements within the virtual environment, ensuring that the technical aspects aligned with the artistic vision of the project. Additionally, I assisted in optimizing the performance of the VR experience to provide a smooth and immersive experience for users.

subtitles.title: Tech Stack
subtitles.content: Unity, C#, Blender, Adobe Photoshop, Oculus VR
